name: Thoroughbred-tachi no Eikan: The Victorious Thoroughbreds
overview: Thoroughbred Tatsu no Eikan - The Victorious Thoroughbred's is a mix between a breeding game and a simulation game. The player can choose what horses he want to mix to give birth a new stallion that he will use to compete in the different races that are around Japan. The gameplay in the horse racing part is about moving the horse and try to make him gain speed in different parts of the race to win each race.
